original_text: The sojourner who is among you shall rise higher and higher above you, and you shall come down lower and lower.
korean_text: 너의 중에 우거하는 이방인은 점점 높아져서 네 위에 뛰어나고 너는 점점 낮아질 것이며

sentences.original_text: shall rise higher and higher above you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 위로 점점 더 높아질 것이며

sentences.original_text: and you shall come down lower and lower.
